Class VisualizerLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane
              • starvationevasion.vis.visuals.VisualizerLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class VisualizerLayout
extends javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane
    Created by Tess Daughton on 11/23/15. Layout Manager for LargeEarthMode starvationevasion.client.Aegislash.GUI

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VisualizerLayout(EarthViewer earthViewer, int largeRadius)
      VisualizerLayout Constructor Adds the custom event handler to this layout, called UserEventHandler Also adds a style sheet to the layout, located in assets/style.css Creates a 3D view of Earth and initializes it to the center of the BorderPane
